remarks: The set of "raw expressions", which are expressions without a typecode, that is, just sequences of constants and variables.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mrexval.c $e |- C = ( mCN ` T ) $.
mrexval.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
mrexval.r $e |- R = ( mREx ` T ) $.
mrexval $p |- ( T e. W -> R = Word ( C u. V ) ) $.
